title: Sharpening Station
summaries: The Sharpening Station is a furniture item found naturally generated in Underground Cabins in the Underground Jungle. In Hardmode, it is also sold by the Merchant for 10.

Placing and pressing ⚷ Open / Activate on the Sharpening Station grants the Sharpened buff, which increases armor penetration of all melee weapons by 12. This lasts until the player dies or leaves the world, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version]), or by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]).

Unlike <linked>equipment buff items</linked>, the Sharpening Station must be placed in order to activate the buff. It can be mined with a <linked>pickaxe</linked> or <linked>drill</linked> and picked up again, even while the buff is active, which will not cancel the buff. Placement is only dependent on an adequate space of 3×2 tiles being available.
